about_the_game:
An extensive 150-page strategy guide for The King's Heroes! Includes:

  • all maps
  • a complete walkthrough
  • general hints and tips
  • monster weaknesses and battle strategies
  • descriptions of all characters (with their spell lists), states and difficulty modes

How to find the guide


From your computer, go to:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common
Then select the game folder.

Or directly from the Steam Client, first right-click on the game, then select:
Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files
